trans-unit.source: Represents a persistence service configuration element that specifies the type of the persistence provider implementation to use, as well as the time-out to use for persistence operations.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个持久性服务配置元素，指定的持久性提供程序实现，若要使用，以及用于持久性操作超时值的类型。

trans-unit.source: Additional attributes that appear in this element are passed into the constructor for the specified persistence provider.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的持久性提供程序，可将出现在此元素的其他属性传递到构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Persistence provider configuration elements are typically defined in the application configuration file, under the `system.serviceModel` node, in the `serviceBehaviors` subsection of the `behaviors` section.
trans-unit.target: 持久性提供程序配置元素通常定义在应用程序配置文件中下,`system.serviceModel`节点，请在`serviceBehaviors`的小节`behaviors`部分。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PersistenceProviderElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PersistenceProviderElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of behavior.
trans-unit.target: 获取行为的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of behavior.
trans-unit.target: 行为的类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个基于此配置元素的设置的自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: A custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于此配置元素的设置的自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this configuration element has been modified since it was last saved or loaded.
trans-unit.target: 指示自上次保存或加载以来是否已修改此配置元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已修改的元素;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether an unknown attribute is encountered during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 指示反序列化过程中是否遇到未知的属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the unrecognized attribute.
trans-unit.target: 无法识别的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the unrecognized attribute.
trans-unit.target: 无法识别的属性值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an unknown attribute is encountered while deserializing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在反序列化; 时遇到未知的属性否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time-out used for persistence operations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于持久性操作的超时值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the time-out used for persistence operations.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>，它指定用于持久性操作的超时值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional attributes of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PersistenceProviderElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取其他属性<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PersistenceProviderElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> object that contains additional attributes of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PersistenceProviderElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref>对象，其中包含此其他属性<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PersistenceProviderElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called after deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化之后调用。

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of this configuration element to the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 将此配置元素的内容写入配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> that is used to write to the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>用于写入配置文件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to serialize only the collection key properties; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>只序列化集合键属性;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any data was actually serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果实际序列化任何数据;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the persistence provider to be used by the service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要由服务的持久性提供程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the persistence provider to be used by the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务使用的永久性提供程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: Modifies this configuration element object to remove all values that should not be saved.
trans-unit.target: 修改此配置元素对象，以移除所有不应该保存的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> at the current level containing a merged view of the properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>当前级别上包含属性的合并的视图。

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this is the top level.
trans-unit.target: 父<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果这是最高级别。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode"></xref> that determines which property values to include.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode"> </xref> ，它确定要包括哪些属性值。
